review_data.title: Take Away
review_data.content: I ordered take away food sunday night. Very fast delivery, the taste, size and quality of the grilled Octopus was simply perfect! Great place, great food!

review_data.title: Bar e Restaurante
review_data.content: O Loft One é um bar/restaurante com um ambiente muito simpático. A comida é ótima o serviço é mega eficiente!...More

review_data.title: Good and had a nice evening
review_data.content: More like a bar than a restaurant but they serve a good quality meal and with enough quantity ! We ate during a salsa dance training which was quite original and pleasant. I had a very good time and the service was excellent.

review_data.title: back to origin
review_data.content: Nice dinner in the terrace, eating a francesinha to remember life in Porto. If you look to try Portuguese cuisine with modern touch, this is the place to visit. Good wine, and digestive :)

review_data.title: PERFEKT
review_data.content: Wenn du die Portuguiese Küche vermiesst,gehts du dort. Sehr gut Geschmack, nett Service. Die Kocherin the best. Zum repetieren!

review_data.title: A nice, Portuguese corner
review_data.content: Found this nice little restaurant by accident. Very tasty Portuguese food. Run by the Ferreira family from Madeira who are very welcoming.

review_data.title: Looks like they serve you what they want instead of what you order
